description: This file defines internal APIs for the Sys Rro Uint object, including function prototypes for getting and setting record data and value, used within the BroadWay Runtime System environment.

methods.name: SysRroUintGetRecordData
methods.description: Retrieves the record data for the Sys Rro Uint object, filling the provided buffer with data and updating its size.

methods.name: SysRroUintSetRecordData
methods.description: Sets the record data for the Sys Rro Uint object using the provided buffer and size.

methods.name: SysRroUintGetRecordValue
methods.description: Retrieves the current record value for the Sys Rro Uint object.

methods.name: SysRroUintSetRecordValue
methods.description: Sets the record value for the Sys Rro Uint object to the specified value.
